posts.post_content:
I need a type card for each of these backs. SGC 40-50 only. No HOF'ers. Prefer White Sox if poss. Let me know what you have. Send scans and prices to: [url]quinnsryche@comcast.net[/url]
Thanks!

If you are willing to buy raw, I would check out Dave's Vintage Cards.

I just got this one from them a few days ago for my White Sox type set that I'm working on.  Hopefully the graders at SGC will like it as much as I do ;) ...

[IMG]http://img214.imageshack.us/img214/1571/img073j.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://img714.imageshack.us/img714/1189/img074.jpg[/IMG]

Good luck in your search!
